title: The Life of Muhammad (BBC HDTV - Complete Series)
description:
The Life of Muhammad is a 2011 British a three-part documentary series examining the life of the Prophet Muhammad and the origins of the Islamic faith. The documentary was presented by Rageh Omaar and was broadcast on BBC Two.

Written by: Ziauddin Sardar
Directed by: Faris Kermani
Presented by: Rageh Omaar
Narrated by: Rageh Omaar
Executive producer(s): David Batty, Aaqil Ahmed
Producer: Faris Kermani
Editor: Tim Arrowsmith
Country of origin: United Kingdom
Location(s): Saudi Arabia, Syria, Turkey, Palestine, United States, United Kingdom, Jordan,
Language: English
No. of series: 1
No. of episodes: 3
Running time: 60 minutes
Production company: Crescent Films
Original channel: BBC One
